solution_line_template: Maggie sells {subscriptions_to_neighbor_one} subscriptions to a neighbor and twice that amount to another neighbor so she sells {subscriptions_to_neighbor_one}*{multiplier_for_other_neighbor} = <<{subscriptions_to_neighbor_one}*{multiplier_for_other_neighbor}={subscriptions_to_neighbor_two}>>{subscriptions_to_neighbor_two} subscriptions to the other neighbor

She earns ${pay_per_subscription} per subscription she sells so she earns {pay_per_subscription}*{total_subscriptions} = $<<{pay_per_subscription}*{total_subscriptions}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}
